channel.title: SF-CMP on San Francisco Congestion Management Program (CMP) Reports
channel.description: Recent content in SF-CMP on San Francisco Congestion Management Program (CMP) Reports

item.title: Population and jobs
item.description: var csvdata = [["metric","2011","2012","2013","2014","2015","2016","2017","2018","2019","2020"],["Population","812826","825863","837442","852469","864816","870887","884363","883305","881549","873965"],["Jobs","552900","583400","604000","627900","665400","700500","714600","728300","758000","654000"]]; var colors = ['', '#8CB8CA', '#D4D757', '#CA7F9B', '#F7CF3F']; var data = []; var xvals; for (let i in csvdata) { if (i==0) { xvals = csvdata[i].slice(1); } else { data.push({x: xvals, y: csvdata[i].slice(1), name: csvdata[i][0], type: 'scatter', marker: {color: colors[i]} }) } } var layout = { title: "San Francisco Population and Jobs Growth", xaxis: { autotick: false, }, yaxis: { rangemode: 'tozero', }, }; var config = {responsive: false}; Plotly.

item.title: Pedestrian and bicycle safety
item.description: var csvdata = [["metric","2008","2009","2010","2011","2012","2013","2014","2015","2016","2017","2018","2019","2020"],["Pedestrian","13","17","14","17","16","21","18","25","19","15","16","19","14"],["Bicycle","3","1","1","4","2","4","2","4","4","2","4","1","2"]]; var colors = ['', '#8CB8CA', '#D4D757', '#CA7F9B', '#F7CF3F']; var data = []; var xvals; for (let i in csvdata) { if (i==0) { xvals = csvdata[i].slice(1); } else { data.push({x: xvals, y: csvdata[i].slice(1), name: csvdata[i][0], type: 'bar', marker: {color: colors[i]} }) } } var layout = { title: "Pedestrian and Bicycle Fatalities", xaxis: { autotick: false, }, yaxis: { rangemode: 'tozero', }, barmode: 'stack', }; var config = {responsive: false}; Plotly.
